{"id":950530572,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1684120276,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/950530572/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Power of Heroes","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int sumOfPower(int[] nums) {\n        int ans=0;\n        int mod=1000000007;\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            ans+=(nums[i]*nums[i]*nums[i])%mod;\n\n            for(int j=i+1;j<nums.length;j++){\n                ans+=(nums[i]*nums[j]*nums[j]*Math.pow(2,j-i-1))%mod;\n\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"power-of-heroes","has_notes":false}
